channel.title: hello webxr on Tobias Weiss
channel.description: Recent content in hello webxr on Tobias Weiss

item.title: Running 'Hello WebXR' Instance
item.description: Unfortunately, the official WebXR Demo Instance is down. Luckily, I host a private version of it. Just use the right controller and the trigger button (index finger) to navigate. https://tobias-weiss.org/hello-webxr/
